law.catch_line: Except as otherwise provided in this section, a person may not buy, hold, or use, for burial:...

text.section:
Except as otherwise provided in this section, a person may not buy, hold, or use, for burial:
more than 100 acres in the State; or
any land within the limits of a municipal corporation in the State, unless authorized to do so by the municipal corporation.

section.section: In the Spauldings Election District of Prince George's County, a person may buy, hold, or use, for burial, up to 125 acres in 1 tract.
In the Laurel Election District of Prince George's County, a person that operated a cemetery on or before June 1, 1955, may buy, hold, or use, for burial, up to 200 acres in 1 tract.
In the Kent Election District of Prince George's County, a person may buy, hold, or use, for burial, up to 150 acres in 1 tract.

text.section: In Frederick County, a person may buy, hold, or use, for burial, up to 150 acres in 1 tract.
In Baltimore County, a person may buy, hold, or use, for burial, up to 200 acres in 1 tract.
